sourceMeaningMnemonic: If <radical>someone</radical> wants to <radical>boil</radical>, you let them <kanji>boil</kanji>!
meaningInfo: There's someone in your face yelling about how they want to boil! You yell back, "Okay, if you want to boil, just boil!"
readingMnemonic: Welp, the pot is at a rolling <kanji>boil</kanji> and your <reading>knee</reading> (<ja>に</ja>) is in there. The person wasn't saying they wanted to boil, they said they wanted to boil someone. And that meant you. Well, your knee anyway.
readingInfo: Once your knee is done boiling, the person kneels down in front of you and presents it on a platter, mocking you, since you can't kneel anymore. You should pay more attention to what's going on from now on or you could find yourself in... HOT WATER. Ohohoho.
